instruction: Design a comic strip about the importance of recycling
output:
Panel 1
[A person stands in front of a garbage can overflowing with trash.] 
Person: Ugh! The garbage can is overflowing again! 

Panel 2
[The person notices a sign taped to the garbage can that reads "Please recycle"] 
Person: Oh! I guess I forgot to recycle!

Panel 3
[The person is sorting trash into a recycling bin.] 
Person: Recycling is important to help keep our planet clean and reduce waste! 

Panel 4
[The person smiles.] 
Person: We all have a responsibility to take care of our environment!
